block.copperwiremod.copperwire.tooltip: Use the top, bottom, left, right, or center to toggle connections
block.copperwiremod.copper_psrc.tooltip: Adjustable Copper Power and Redstone Power emitter
block.copperwiremod.copper_diode.tooltip: Boosts the copper step value to 15 if the redstone value > 0
block.copperwiremod.copper_lantern.toolt: Just like the redstone torch, but inverts the redstone value
block.copperwiremod.copper_pmeter.toolti: Measures the redstone value and copper step on a wire or dust.
block.copperwiremod.copper_signallock.to: Retains the signal value from when it was last enabled.
